# Blacklist Negative Cases (Should Pass)

Each line below uses alternatives to blacklisted words and should NOT trigger a violation.

1. We use advanced AI to solve problems.
2. The system is reliable enough to handle failures.
3. Our smooth integration enables productivity.
4. This feature is key to our success.
5. Security is essential for our platform.
6. Teams apply their existing tools.
7. The architecture is strong and scalable.
8. We provide smooth updates.
9. This decision is central to the roadmap.
10. User feedback is important for iteration.
11. Engineers employ new frameworks.
12. Tests make the codebase solid.
13. The API provides unified access.
14. Performance is critical in production.
15. Documentation is important for onboarding.
16. We use microservices patterns.
17. The deployment is reliable against failures.
18. Integration is smooth with existing tools.
19. This milestone is key for launch.
20. Monitoring is essential for observability.
